mapper.select: select lpad(max(right(a.CODE, 5)) + 1, 5, '0') from TB_TEXT a where a.CODE like 'GEN_SGP_%' and right(a.CODE, 5) < '10000'
mapper.insert: insert into TB_TEXT (CODE, LOCALE, TEXT, COMMENT, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_IP, MODIFIED_TIME, MODIFIED_IP) values (#{code}, #{locale}, #{text}, #{comment}, NOW(), #{createdIp}, NOW(), #{modifiedIp})
